oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to Katherine Haught from husband Benjamin Haught
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter was written from Island Hospital, Ward 3, in Harpers Ferry, West Virginia. Letter was written on "U.S. Christian Commission" stationery. Haught was from Tyler County, Virginia/West Virginia, and in the Union Army. Letter is a part of a large series, all of which was digitized by the Library of Virginia.
